title: Greek Salad
description: Light, easy, healthy, delicious. Very good dinner option to have after a work day.
story:
As in all salads recipes - you can definitely free your imagination with ingredients you put in. This is the set I like most. Lightly fried pecans - what makes this salad taste special to me.

I like making all the bit about the same size - quite big, almost as big as jumbo black olives.

ingredients.name: red onion
ingredients.preparationNotes: quick pickled in a tbsp of vinegar ans tsp of sugar

ingredients.name: seasoning:
ingredients.preparationNotes: : salt, pepper, Italian herbs mix, olive oil, lemon juice

instructions: Fry nuts in a clean dry pan for 5-7 minutes on medium heat, for nuts to set free the aroma.
Cut all vegetables around the same size.
Pickle thinely sliced red onion in some vinegar and sugar.
